alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 4:24AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Okaloosa County through 415 AM CDT... At 324 AM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles west of De Funiak Springs to Cinco Bayou. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wright, Fort Walton Beach, Crestview, Niceville, Destin, Eglin AFB, Valparaiso, Mary Esther, Ocean City, Lake Lorraine, Shalimar, Laurel Hill and Cinco Bayou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CDT for northwestern Florida.
